attributes.action: To not increase the financial requirements for UK family visas
attributes.additional_details: This change will impact UK citizens. The new financial requirements put a price on love. The initial requirement was brought in to ensure that a foreign spouse could be financially supported. This ridiculous and disproportionate increase is above the salary of many working professionals. It makes it almost impossible for a person earning a good salary to marry and be together with a foreign spouse. The policy is also ageist and will disproportionately affect those who are young or retired. A policy on limiting migration should not limit the rights of UK citizens.
attributes.background: To review the change planned for April 2024 to increase the financial requirement to sponsor non UK spouses from £18600 a year. The change should be cancelled and the requirement left unchanged or removed.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652602
